Text: MKV file,, whats wrong,, why not avi..?
I appreciate the upload but don't understand why .mkv and not.avi?Can't play these on my dvd player or PS3.

Sign up is not open to everyone but only those who donate money,this goes against the idea of the pirate bay somewhat.

I would not pay out of principle,you haven't the talent to make music or film so why should you make money out of it?I'd rather actually pay full price than pay people making money off other peoples talent.

Why not upload as AVI?

This is not the spirit of PB!
Mkv can be played on any computer using media player classic :)
